description: Implement a singly linked list in Java and provide unit tests for all operations.
Create a personal portfolio website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The site must be responsive and include at least three sections.
Complete the online quiz covering Python syntax, variables, and control flow.
Compare the performance of bubble sort, merge sort, and quicksort on large datasets. Submit a report with your findings.
Write a requirements document for a proposed software project, including user stories and acceptance criteria.
Implement a binary search tree in Java and demonstrate insert, delete, and search operations.
Write Python programs that use loops and functions to solve basic problems. Submit your code and screenshots of output.
Design an ER diagram and implement the schema in SQL for a small business scenario.
Solve problems related to time and space complexity. Show all work and explanations.
Write a reflection on your team's first agile sprint, including what went well and what could be improved.
Write SQL queries to retrieve and manipulate data from a sample database. Submit your queries and results.
Create a web page that uses JavaScript to dynamically update the DOM based on user input.
Complete problems involving recursion in Java. Submit your code and explanations.
Build a web page layout using CSS Flexbox. The layout should be responsive and visually appealing.
Submit a proposal for your final project, including objectives, technologies, and a timeline.
Simulate a CPU scheduling algorithm like Round Robin or Shortest Job First in C++ or Java.
Build a Naive Bayes classifier to detect spam emails. Submit your Python code and a performance report.
Create a simple command-line chat application using TCP sockets in Python.
Identify and exploit SQL injection vulnerabilities in a provided web application.
Develop a functional to-do list application for Android with persistent storage.
Write a report comparing different memory allocation strategies.
Implement a linear regression model from scratch to predict housing prices.
Use Scapy or a similar library to capture and analyze network packets.
Use common tools to perform dictionary and brute-force attacks on a list of password hashes.
Create a wireframe and design mockup for a new mobile application concept.
